content.description: A sphere on the end of a string is released from rest at point X and swings through point Y to point Z, as shown in the figure above. Point Y is the lowest point for the sphere as it swings. Air resistance is negligible.
content.question: Four directions at point Z are indicated as I, II, III, and IV in the figure above. Which of the arrows best indicates the direction of the acceleration of the sphere at point Z?

choices.label: The direction of the acceleration is undefined because the acceleration equals zero.
